about_the_game:
Welcome to Unknown FPV Demo, an exhilarating first-person view (FPV) drone simulator that will take you on a thrilling ride through a ever-evolving stylized environment. Whether you're a seasoned pilot looking to hone your skills or a beginner eager to learn the art of flying, this simulator is the perfect training ground. Best of all, mastering the game will not only save you money but also equip you with the expertise to fly in real life.

Physics & Multiplayer
Unknown FPV's physics engine strives to replicate real-life dynamics but with a touch of arcade to make it more fun.

Difference to full version / early access version
The full version includes more track layout and allows you to venture outside the starting area. And did we mention? it also supports multiplayer so that you can challenge your friends and fellow pilots in exhilarating races and breathtaking stunts.

Exploration & Cinematics

In Unknown FPV you can chase cars along serpentine roads! Push your drone to the limits in the forest dodging trees or venture across open landscape covered with breath taking grass.

Racing

Want to become one of the fastest pilots on this world? Unknown FPV features GP style racing course layouts so you can practice flying 6s style kamikaze drones, more layouts included in full version!

Customization is fun but..
Customization is at the heart of Unknown FPV. You have the freedom to tweak the essential settings you'd typically adjust on your drone. Our team comprises seasoned FPV racing pilots, cinematic pilots, and freestyle pilots who have streamlined the customization process, eliminating unnecessary complexity and noise. Only the key settings remain, empowering you to spend less time in settings menu and more time flying.

We value your feedback
Our development team is fueled by the invaluable feedback and input of our community. We consider you, the player, an integral part of the development process, and that's why we're releasing the game in an early playtest phase. This approach allows us to focus on what truly matters and ensures that we build a game that resonates with you as a pilot.

A very important notice!
You need a controller to play this game, PS4, Xbox will work, the best experience is achieved using a transmitter if you have one.
Support can only be offered in English. There is no menu support for controllers yet!

name: Unknown FPV: FPV Drone Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quadcore processor @ 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: RC Transmitter or Gamepad is needed to control
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Quadcore processor @ 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: RC Transmitter or Gamepad is needed to control

short_description: Unknown FPV: The ultimate FPV drone simulator. Master the art of flying in a stylized world. Awesome physics, customizable settings. Beginners learn, experts escape. Join us on the journey to make FPV simulators great again.
